name: Bernhart Associates Executive Search
overview:
Bernhart Associates Executive Search, LLC is one of the nation’s leading and most experienced search firms in digital and direct marketing. Bernhart Associates is owned and managed by Jerry Bernhart, a veteran recruiter in digital marketing, multichannel direct marketing, CRM, Ecommerce, Database Marketing, Marketing Analysis and Business Development/Sales. Bernhart Associates conducts a widely followed hiring survey that tracks national employment trends in digital and DM. For ten years, Jerry Bernhart owned and managed the internet’s first direct marketing-specific job site, directmarkertingcareers.com. In 2009, Bernhart Associates partnered with the DMA to produce the DMA’s Employment Outlook Report. That same year, Jerry authored a widely acclaimed white paper for the International Journal of Mobile Marketing on required job skills for the mobile marketing “ecosystem”.

Since 1992, Jerry has been Director of Executive Search for the CRM/Database Marketing Institute and was a contributor to the critically acclaimed Data Mining Cookbook.

In 2002, Bernhart Associates achieved membership in The Pinnacle Society, an organization of the nation’s top achieving executive search firms
